attributes.title: Dog Peer Pressure
attributes.review: This app is trying to turn my dog into a Republican! It all started on Monday morning, 2020, when my dog and I went to PetSmart. My dog could look at nothing else but the Trump 2020 collar! I got this app as a joke, but then I realized that it had been telling my dog lies about Democrats when I fell asleep at night. Now whenever Joe Biden pops up on the TV screen, my dog will start barking and growling nonstop. I donâ€™t know what to do. I respect my dogâ€™s opinion and all, but itâ€™s starting to get out of hand. I caught her last night trying to reserve a seat at the next Trump rally! So, yes, this review deserves one star because Trump peer pressured my dog into becoming a Republican.
